amendment.description: Amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 18, as modified, 20, 84, 22, 23, 57, 72, 96, 150, 151 and 149 printed in House Report 112-88.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-88 offered as en bloc # 6: Nos. 18, as modified, 20, 84, 22, 23, 57, 72, 96, 15, 151 and 149.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A048) offered by Mr. McKeon.
McKeon amendment (A048) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A048) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
